mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_pre_deposit_log (create_time, change_money, remarks, change_type, change_type_desc,store_id, operator_id, operator_type, operator_ip, order_number, balance, detail_reason, transfer_time, merchant_order_number) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{changeMoney}, #{remarks}, #{changeType}, #{changeTypeDesc},#{storeId}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorType}, #{operatorIp}, #{orderNumber}, #{balance}, #{detailReason}, #{transferTime}, #{merchantOrderNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT spd.* FROM st_pre_deposit AS spd INNER JOIN emp_employee AS ee ON spd.store_id = ee.store_id WHERE ee.emp_id = #{userId}
